Conclusion: Mix- and MoE-DPO 提供了一种强大且可扩展的方法，用于基于偏好的 LLM 对齐，克服了标准 DPO 在处理多任务和异构偏好分布方面的局限性。

Abstract: Direct Preference Optimization (DPO) has recently emerged as a simple and
effective alternative to reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF) for
aligning large language models (LLMs) with user preferences. However, existing
DPO formulations rely on a single monolithic model, which limits their
expressivity in multi-task settings and their adaptability to heterogeneous or
diverse preference distributions. In this work, we propose Mix- and MoE-DPO, a
framework that extends DPO with both soft mixture models and mixture-of-experts
(MoE) architectures, using a stochastic variational inference approach. Our
method introduces a latent-variable model over expert assignments and optimizes
a variational evidence lower bound (ELBO), enabling stable and efficient
learning of specialized expert policies from preference data. Mix- and MoE-DPO
provides three key advantages over standard DPO: (i) generalization via
universal function approximation through mixtures; (ii) reward and policy
specialization through expert components tailored to distinct preference modes;
and (iii) contextual alignment through input-dependent soft gating that enables
user-specific mixture policies. Our framework supports both shared base
architectures with expert-specific policy heads and fully independent expert
models, allowing flexible trade-offs between parameter efficiency and
specialization. We validate our approach on a variety of model sizes and
multi-preference datasets, demonstrating that Mix- and MoE-DPO offers a
powerful and scalable method for preference-based LLM alignment.

</details>


### [326] [Counterfactual Identifiability via Dynamic Optimal Transport](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08294)
*Fabio De Sousa Ribeiro,Ainkaran Santhirasekaram,Ben Glocker*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: 该论文解决了从观测数据中识别高维多变量反事实结果的开放性问题。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 已有的反事实推理工作虽然有前景但缺乏可识别性，这削弱了其估计的因果有效性。本研究旨在为多变量反事实的可识别性奠定基础。

Method: 使用连续时间流（包括非马尔可夫设置）来建立多变量反事实可识别性的基础。通过动态最优传输的工具，明确了流匹配产生唯一、单调和保序反事实传输图的条件，以确保推理的一致性。

Result: 在具有反事实真实情况的受控场景中验证了理论，并在真实图像上证明了公理反事实合理性的改进。

Conclusion: 提出了一种使用连续时间流来识别高维多变量反事实结果的方法，并证明了其在理论和实践中的有效性。

Abstract: We address the open question of counterfactual identification for
high-dimensional multivariate outcomes from observational data. Pearl (2000)
argues that counterfactuals must be identifiable (i.e., recoverable from the
observed data distribution) to justify causal claims. A recent line of work on
counterfactual inference shows promising results but lacks identification,
undermining the causal validity of its estimates. To address this, we establish
a foundation for multivariate counterfactual identification using
continuous-time flows, including non-Markovian settings under standard
criteria. We characterise the conditions under which flow matching yields a
unique, monotone and rank-preserving counterfactual transport map with tools
from dynamic optimal transport, ensuring consistent inference. Building on
this, we validate the theory in controlled scenarios with counterfactual
ground-truth and demonstrate improvements in axiomatic counterfactual soundness
on real images.

</details>


### [327] [Bridging the Physics-Data Gap with FNO-Guided Conditional Flow Matching: Designing Inductive Bias through Hierarchical Physical Constraints](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08295)
*Tsuyoshi Okita*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种结合傅里叶神经算子（FNO）和条件流匹配（CFM）的层次化框架，用于生成在物理约束下的一致性时间序列数据。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统时间序列生成方法忽略了特定领域的物理约束，导致统计和物理不一致。本研究旨在通过将物理定律的层次结构（守恒、动力学、边界和经验关系）嵌入深度生成模型来解决此问题，引入物理信息归纳偏差的新范式。

Method: 该框架结合了用于学习物理算子的傅里叶神经算子（FNO）和用于概率生成的条件流匹配（CFM）。通过依赖时间的层次化约束和FNO指导的校正进行整合。

Result: 实验结果表明，与基线方法相比，该方法在谐振子、人类活动识别和锂离子电池退化等任务上，生成质量提高了16.3%，物理违反次数减少了46%，预测准确性提高了18.5%。

Conclusion: 所提出的框架通过在深度生成模型中嵌入物理定律的层次结构，成功地生成了在统计和物理上都一致的时间序列数据，并在多个应用领域取得了显著的性能提升。

Abstract: Conventional time-series generation often ignores domain-specific physical
constraints, limiting statistical and physical consistency. We propose a
hierarchical framework that embeds the inherent hierarchy of physical
laws-conservation, dynamics, boundary, and empirical relations-directly into
deep generative models, introducing a new paradigm of physics-informed
inductive bias. Our method combines Fourier Neural Operators (FNOs) for
learning physical operators with Conditional Flow Matching (CFM) for
probabilistic generation, integrated via time-dependent hierarchical
constraints and FNO-guided corrections. Experiments on harmonic oscillators,
human activity recognition, and lithium-ion battery degradation show 16.3%
higher generation quality, 46% fewer physics violations, and 18.5% improved
predictive accuracy over baselines.

</details>


### [328] [Dynamic Features Adaptation in Networking: Toward Flexible training and Explainable inference](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08303)
*Yannis Belkhiter,Seshu Tirupathi,Giulio Zizzo,Merim Dzaferagic,John D. Kelleher*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: Adaptive Random Forests (ARFs) and Drift-Aware Feature Importance (DAFI) are proposed as solutions for AI in dynamic 6G network control, offering stable predictions and efficient explainability.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: AI models in 6G networks need to adapt to continuously changing conditions like new features and evolving service requirements.

Method: This paper proposes Adaptive Random Forests (ARFs) for dynamic feature adaptation and Drift-Aware Feature Importance (DAFI) for explainability, using a distributional drift detector to optimize feature importance calculations.

Result: ARFs show improved accuracy over time with iterative training and new features. DAFI reduces runtime by up to 2 times and provides more consistent feature importance values across three datasets.

Conclusion: ARFs and DAFI offer a promising framework for flexible AI methods adapted to 6G network use-cases, addressing the need for adaptability and explainability in AI-driven networks.

Abstract: As AI becomes a native component of 6G network control, AI models must adapt
to continuously changing conditions, including the introduction of new features
and measurements driven by multi-vendor deployments, hardware upgrades, and
evolving service requirements. To address this growing need for flexible
learning in non-stationary environments, this vision paper highlights Adaptive
Random Forests (ARFs) as a reliable solution for dynamic feature adaptation in
communication network scenarios. We show that iterative training of ARFs can
effectively lead to stable predictions, with accuracy improving over time as
more features are added. In addition, we highlight the importance of
explainability in AI-driven networks, proposing Drift-Aware Feature Importance
(DAFI) as an efficient XAI feature importance (FI) method. DAFI uses a
distributional drift detector to signal when to apply computationally intensive
FI methods instead of lighter alternatives. Our tests on 3 different datasets
indicate that our approach reduces runtime by up to 2 times, while producing
more consistent feature importance values. Together, ARFs and DAFI provide a
promising framework to build flexible AI methods adapted to 6G network
use-cases.

</details>


### [329] [Robust and Efficient Collaborative Learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08311)
*Abdellah El Mrini,Sadegh Farhadkhan,Rachid Guerraoui*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: RPEL是一种新的、可扩展的协作方法，可以防止在分布式机器学习中的敌对行为，通过使用一种分层的、基于拉取和流行病传播的通信策略，通信成本从O(n^2)降低到O(n log n)，并且在保持高准确率的同时，不需要中央服务器。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有协作机器学习方法在面对训练时期的对抗性行为时，要么依赖中心服务器，要么通信成本过高。本研究旨在提出一种新的、可扩展的协作方法来解决这些问题。

Method: 提出了一种名为RPEL（Robust Pull-based Epidemic Learning）的新型协作方法。该方法不依赖任何中心服务器，并采用一种基于拉取和流行病传播的通信策略，将通信成本从O(n^2)降低到O(n log n)。

Result: RPEL在对抗性环境中保持了鲁棒性，准确率可与全对全通信相媲美，并且在大型网络中具有高效的可扩展性。

Conclusion: RPEL是一种有效的、可扩展的协作机器学习方法，能够有效应对训练时期的对抗性行为，并且通信成本较低。

Abstract: Collaborative machine learning is challenged by training-time adversarial
behaviors. Existing approaches to tolerate such behaviors either rely on a
central server or induce high communication costs. We propose Robust Pull-based
Epidemic Learning (RPEL), a novel, scalable collaborative approach to ensure
robust learning despite adversaries. RPEL does not rely on any central server
and, unlike traditional methods, where communication costs grow in
$\mathcal{O}(n^2)$ with the number of nodes $n$, RPEL employs a pull-based
epidemic-based communication strategy that scales in $\mathcal{O}(n \log n)$.
By pulling model parameters from small random subsets of nodes, RPEL
significantly lowers the number of required messages without compromising
convergence guarantees, which hold with high probability. Empirical results
demonstrate that RPEL maintains robustness in adversarial settings, competes
with all-to-all communication accuracy, and scales efficiently across large
networks.

</details>


### [330] [To Ask or Not to Ask: Learning to Require Human Feedback](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08314)
*Andrea Pugnana,Giovanni De Toni,Cesare Barbera,Roberto Pellungrini,Bruno Lepri,Andrea Passerini*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: LtA框架通过结合ML模型和人类反馈，优化了何时以及如何利用专家意见，从而在分类任务中实现更有效的人机协作。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的学习推迟（LtD）方法将人类和ML模型视为独立的决策者，限制了专家仅能进行预测。本研究旨在解决这一局限性，提出了一种新的框架，能够同时处理何时以及如何将专家意见纳入ML模型。

Method: 提出了一种名为‘学习提问’（LtA）的新框架，该框架包含一个标准的ML模型和一个通过额外专家人类反馈进行训练的增强模型。LtA具有一个最优策略来决定何时查询增强模型，并提供了两种实现方式：顺序方法和联合方法。对于联合方法，设计了具有可实现一致性保证的代理损失函数。

Result: 实验结果表明，LtA框架比现有方法在分类任务中提供了更灵活、更强大的基础，能够实现更有效的人机协作。

Conclusion: LtA框架通过整合ML模型和人类反馈，并在决定何时何地利用专家意见方面采用了最优策略，为实现更有效的人机协作提供了有力支持。

Abstract: Developing decision-support systems that complement human performance in
classification tasks remains an open challenge. A popular approach, Learning to
Defer (LtD), allows a Machine Learning (ML) model to pass difficult cases to a
human expert. However, LtD treats humans and ML models as mutually exclusive
decision-makers, restricting the expert contribution to mere predictions. To
address this limitation, we propose Learning to Ask (LtA), a new framework that
handles both when and how to incorporate expert input in an ML model. LtA is
based on a two-part architecture: a standard ML model and an enriched model
trained with additional expert human feedback, with a formally optimal strategy
for selecting when to query the enriched model. We provide two practical
implementations of LtA: a sequential approach, which trains the models in
stages, and a joint approach, which optimises them simultaneously. For the
latter, we design surrogate losses with realisable-consistency guarantees. Our
experiments with synthetic and real expert data demonstrate that LtA provides a
more flexible and powerful foundation for effective human-AI collaboration.

</details>


### [331] [Learning What's Missing: Attention Dispersion and EMA Stabilization in Length Generalization](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08341)
*Pál Zsámboki,Benjamin Levi,David Ansel Josef Smith,Mitansh Kagalwala,Arlington Kell,Samuel Liechty,Cong Wang*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: Transformer 在长度泛化方面存在局限性，尤其是在集合补全任务中，这源于 softmax 对 logit 位移的压缩和训练更新的噪声。研究表明，增加嵌入和值维度、使用 dropout 和 EMA 训练可以改善长度泛化。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究 Transformer 在集合补全任务中的长度泛化能力，该能力对于类似棋盘游戏式的推理至关重要。

Method: 对单层注意力 Transformer 进行了理论分析，证明了嵌入和值维度的界限，并研究了模型在长度 1 和 2 上的对数位移平衡与泛化能力之间的关系。通过随机超参数搜索验证了 dropout 和 EMA 对长度泛化的促进作用，并在 OthelloGPT 模型上进行了测试。

Result: 证明了单层 Transformer 的嵌入和值维度的界限；证明了在长度 1 和 2 上实现对数位移平衡的模型可以泛化到更长序列，但精度会降低；验证了 dropout 和 EMA 可以改善长度泛化；OthelloGPT 模型也显示出 EMA 能够提高长度泛化能力。

Conclusion: Transformer 在长度泛化方面存在固有的挑战，尤其是在处理需要复杂推理的任务时。尽管存在这些挑战，但通过精心设计的模型结构（如增加嵌入和值维度）和训练策略（如使用 dropout 和 EMA），可以显著提高其长度泛化能力。

Abstract: We study length generalization in transformers through the set complement
task, where a model must predict a uniform distribution over tokens absent from
an input sequence -- an ability central to board-game style reasoning. Our main
theoretical result establishes two statements. First, we prove tight bounds on
embedding and value dimensions for single-layer attention-only transformers.
Second, we show that if such a model achieves balanced logit displacement at
lengths 1 and 2, then it must generalize to longer sequences, though with
reduced precision. A mechanistic reading of the proof explains this limitation:
as more tokens are attended to, softmax compresses logit displacements, eroding
separation between valid and invalid outputs. Training dynamics also suggest a
second obstacle: when many next tokens are possible, updates become noisy. We
hypothesize that dropout can counteract the first effect and Exponential Moving
Average (EMA) the second. We validate these hypotheses through random
hyperparameter search on the set complement task, which confirms both
mechanisms. We then test OthelloGPT, a GPT-1 style model trained on random
Othello moves, and find that EMA again improves length generalization in this
more complex setting.

</details>


### [332] [DeepEN: Personalized Enteral Nutrition for Critically Ill Patients using Deep Reinforcement Learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08350)
*Daniel Jason Tan,Jiayang Chen,Dilruk Perera,Kay Choong See,Mengling Feng*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: DeepEN是一个深度强化学习框架，用于重症监护患者的个性化肠内营养（EN）治疗。该模型在MIMIC-IV数据库的11000多名患者数据上进行离线训练，可以生成每4小时一次的卡路里、蛋白质和液体摄入量建议，并根据患者的生理状况进行调整。DeepEN采用了带保守Q学习正则化的决斗双深度Q网络，能够学习到临床上现实且符合高价值临床医生操作的策略，同时避免不安全的偏差。与临床医生和指南驱动的策略相比，DeepEN在各项指标上均表现更优，估计死亡率降低了3.7个百分点（18.8% vs 22.5%），并在主要的营养生物标志物方面有所改善。这表明深度学习驱动的EN治疗个性化方法在改善患者预后方面具有巨大潜力，超越了传统的基于指南或启发式的方法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 重症监护患者的营养不良是一个普遍存在的问题，可能导致不良的临床结局。传统的肠内营养（EN）治疗通常依赖于临床指南或经验，缺乏个性化，并且可能无法根据患者不断变化的生理状况进行有效调整。

Method: DeepEN框架利用深度强化学习（RL），具体采用了一种带有保守Q学习（CQL）正则化的决斗双深度Q网络（Dueling Double Deep Q-Network）算法。该模型在MIMIC-IV数据库中超过11,000名重症监护患者的数据上进行离线训练。模型设计了一个精心策划的、临床知情的状态空间，并结合了一个自定义的奖励函数，该函数旨在平衡短期生理和营养目标与长期生存结局。

Result: DeepEN框架在各项定性和定量评估指标上均优于临床医生制定的策略和基于指南的策略。具体而言，DeepEN将估计死亡率降低了3.7 ± 0.17个百分点（从22.5%降至18.8%）。此外，该模型在改善关键营养生物标志物方面也取得了显著效果。

Conclusion: DeepEN框架通过安全、数据驱动的个性化EN治疗，能够显著改善重症监护患者的预后，其效果超越了传统的基于指南或启发式的方法。这为EN治疗的个性化和智能化提供了新的方向。

Abstract: We introduce DeepEN, a deep reinforcement learning (RL) framework for
personalized enteral nutrition (EN) in critically ill patients. Trained offline
on over 11,000 ICU patients from the MIMIC-IV database, DeepEN generates
4-hourly recommendations for caloric, protein, and fluid intake tailored to
each patient's evolving physiology. The model integrates a curated, clinically
informed state space with a custom reward function that balances short-term
physiological and nutrition-related goals with long-term survival outcomes.
Using a dueling double deep Q-network with conservative Q-learning
regularization, DeepEN learns clinically realistic policies that align with
high-value clinician actions while discouraging unsafe deviations. Across
various qualitative and quantitative metrics, DeepEN outperforms
clinician-derived and guideline-based policies, achieving a 3.7 $\pm$ 0.17
percentage-point reduction in estimated mortality (18.8% vs 22.5%) and
improvements in key nutritional biomarkers. These findings highlight the
potential of safe, data-driven personalization of EN therapy to improve
outcomes beyond traditional guideline- or heuristic-based approaches.

</details>


### [333] [Guided Star-Shaped Masked Diffusion](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08369)
*Viacheslav Meshchaninov,Egor Shibaev,Artem Makoian,Ivan Klimov,Danil Sheshenya,Andrei Malinin,Nikita Balagansky,Daniil Gavrilov,Aibek Alanov,Dmitry Vetrov*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: 通过引入星型范式和可学习重掩码调度器，改进了预训练扩散模型的采样过程，提高了样本质量和效率，尤其是在低步长生成方面。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 预训练掩码扩散模型的性能受到其不可逆的采样过程的限制，该过程在低步长生成方面存在困难。

Method: 提出了一种新颖的采样算法，通过轻量级地微调单个层，并采用星型范式和可学习的重掩码调度器，来实现错误纠正和改进采样效率。

Result: 在文本和代码生成方面的实验表明，该算法在低步长生成方面显著提高了样本质量，并且性能优于或等于现有方法。

Conclusion: 该方法通过引入星型范式和可学习重掩码调度器，成功解决了预训练扩散模型采样效率和质量的问题，尤其在低步长生成方面表现出色。

Abstract: The performance of pre-trained masked diffusion models is often constrained
by their sampling procedure, which makes decisions irreversible and struggles
in low-step generation regimes. We introduce a novel sampling algorithm that
works with pre-trained models and, after a lightweight fine-tuning of a single
layer, significantly improves sample quality and efficiency. Our method
reformulates the generation process using a star-shaped paradigm, which
inherently allows for error correction. To make this process effective, we
augment it with a learnable re-masking scheduler that intelligently identifies
and revises likely errors. This approach yields a substantial quality boost,
particularly when using a small number of sampling steps. We extensively ablate
key components of our approach and show its usability in different scenarios.
In comprehensive experiments on text, and code generation, our sampling
algorithm outperforms or matches existing methods.

</details>


### [334] [Contrastive Self-Supervised Learning at the Edge: An Energy Perspective](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08374)
*Fernanda Famá,Roberto Pereira,Charalampos Kalalas,Paolo Dini,Lorena Qendro,Fahim Kawsar,Mohammad Malekzadeh*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: 对比学习（CL）在资源受限设备上的部署面临挑战，本研究评估了 SimCLR、MoCo、SimSiam 和 Barlow Twins 四种 CL 框架在边缘和雾计算环境中的可行性，并引入了能量分析和减少训练数据条件下的基准测试策略。结果显示 SimCLR 能量消耗最低，并进一步评估了轻量级神经网络架构与 CL 框架的结合。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 尽管对比学习（CL）在自监督表示学习方面展现出巨大潜力，但在资源受限设备上的部署研究却很少。传统 CL 框架的计算需求（能耗、数据可用性、内存）给边缘和雾计算带来了挑战。

Method: 评估了四种主流 CL 框架（SimCLR、MoCo、SimSiam、Barlow Twins）在边缘和雾计算环境中的可行性，采用包含能量分析和减少训练数据条件的系统性基准测试策略，并评估了轻量级神经网络架构与 CL 框架的结合。

Result: SimCLR 在不同数据条件下表现出最低的能量消耗，尽管其计算成本通常被认为很高。

Conclusion: 本研究为在处理能力有限的边缘/雾计算环境中部署 CL 提供了关于资源影响的见解，并为未来的优化开辟了研究方向。

Abstract: While contrastive learning (CL) shows considerable promise in self-supervised
representation learning, its deployment on resource-constrained devices remains
largely underexplored. The substantial computational demands required for
training conventional CL frameworks pose a set of challenges, particularly in
terms of energy consumption, data availability, and memory usage. We conduct an
evaluation of four widely used CL frameworks: SimCLR, MoCo, SimSiam, and Barlow
Twins. We focus on the practical feasibility of these CL frameworks for edge
and fog deployment, and introduce a systematic benchmarking strategy that
includes energy profiling and reduced training data conditions. Our findings
reveal that SimCLR, contrary to its perceived computational cost, demonstrates
the lowest energy consumption across various data regimes. Finally, we also
extend our analysis by evaluating lightweight neural architectures when paired
with CL frameworks. Our study aims to provide insights into the resource
implications of deploying CL in edge/fog environments with limited processing
capabilities and opens several research directions for its future optimization.

</details>


### [335] [Characterizing the Multiclass Learnability of Forgiving 0-1 Loss Functions](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08382)
*Jacob Trauger,Tyson Trauger,Ambuj Tewari*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: 该论文研究了可容错0-1损失函数在有限类别多分类问题中的可学性，并提出了一种基于Natarajan维度的广义Natarajan维度来表征这种可学性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 可容错0-1损失函数在有限类别多分类问题中的可学性。

Method: 提出了一种新的组合维度，即广义Natarajan维度，并证明了该维度与可学性的充要条件。同时，研究了该维度与集合值反馈学习的联系。

Result: 该论文证明了假设类的可学性当且仅当广义Natarajan维度有限。此外，还揭示了集合学习问题的可学性由Natarajan维度表征。

Conclusion: 可容错0-1损失函数在有限类别多分类问题中的可学性可以通过广义Natarajan维度来表征，并且该维度与集合学习问题的可学性密切相关。

Abstract: In this paper we will give a characterization of the learnability of
forgiving 0-1 loss functions in the finite label multiclass setting. To do
this, we create a new combinatorial dimension that is based off of the
Natarajan Dimension \citep{natarajan1989learning} and we show that a hypothesis
class is learnable in our setting if and only if this Generalized Natarajan
Dimension is finite. We also show a connection to learning with set-valued
feedback. Through our results we show that the learnability of a set learning
problem is characterized by the Natarajan Dimension.

</details>


### [336] [FlyLoRA: Boosting Task Decoupling and Parameter Efficiency via Implicit Rank-Wise Mixture-of-Experts](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08396)
*Heming Zou,Yunliang Zang,Wutong Xu,Yao Zhu,Xiangyang Ji*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: FlyLoRA是一种参数高效的微调方法，通过借鉴苍蝇嗅觉系统，引入秩感知的专家激活和隐式路由器，解决了现有LoRA方法的参数干扰问题，在多个领域均取得性能提升。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有LoRA方法存在参数干扰问题，导致性能不佳。MoE-LoRA虽能缓解单任务内的相关性，但在多任务合并时仍会产生任务间干扰，且引入了额外的路由器参数。

Method: 提出FlyLoRA，一种隐式MoE-LoRA变体。包含两点创新：1. 向上投影矩阵中的秩感知专家激活；2. 统一专家路由和向下投影的隐式路由器，使用冻结的稀疏随机投影矩阵替代传统的稠密可训练版本。

Result: 在通用知识理解、科学问答、数学推理和代码生成四个领域进行了广泛的实验，FlyLoRA在所有实验中均持续优于现有方法。

Conclusion: FlyLoRA通过其独特设计解决了参数干扰问题，并在多任务场景下表现出色，证明了生物结构对AI创新的启发作用。

Abstract: Low-Rank Adaptation (LoRA) is a widely used parameter-efficient fine-tuning
method for foundation models, but it suffers from parameter interference,
resulting in suboptimal performance. Although Mixture-of-Experts (MoE)-based
LoRA variants show promise in mitigating intra-task correlations in single-task
instruction tuning, they introduce additional router parameters and remain
ineffective in multi-task model merging where inter-task interference arises.
Inspired by the fly olfactory circuit, we propose FlyLoRA, an implicit
MoE-based LoRA variant that introduces: (1) rank-wise expert activation in the
up-projection matrix, and (2) an implicit router that unifies expert routing
and down-projection, where a frozen sparse random projection matrix replaces
the traditional dense trainable version. This design resolves the trade-off
between intra-task decorrelation and computational efficiency by eliminating
the need for an explicit router, while inherently mitigating inter-task
interference due to the orthogonality property of random matrices. Extensive
experiments across four domains -- general knowledge understanding, scientific
question answering, mathematical reasoning, and code generation -- demonstrate
consistent performance improvements over existing methods. Beyond empirical
gains, FlyLoRA highlights how biological structures can inspire innovations in
AI technologies. Code is available at https://github.com/gfyddha/FlyLoRA.

</details>


### [337] [Biology-driven assessment of deep learning super-resolution imaging of the porosity network in dentin](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08407)
*Lauren Anderson,Lucas Chatelain,Nicolas Tremblay,Kathryn Grandfield,David Rousseau,Aurélien Gourrier*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: 深度学习超分辨率模型可用于提高牙本质小管成像的效率和质量，但标准图像质量评估指标可能无法准确反映其性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 牙齿力学感觉系统部分依赖于牙本质小管中流体流动刺激牙本质细胞，但现有成像技术分辨率有限，限制了成像范围。本研究旨在通过深度学习超分辨率技术克服这一局限。

Method: 本研究测试了四种深度学习（DL）超分辨率（SR）模型（RCAN、pix2pix、FSRCNN和CycleGAN），将低分辨率共聚焦显微图像（像素尺寸增大x2、x4、x8）恢复为高分辨率图像。通过图像质量评估（IQA）指标、分割分析和图分析来评估模型性能。

Result: 标准IQA指标未能准确评估SR模型的性能，并且与视觉感知不一致。通过考虑牙本质小管的尺度和形态进行分割分析，并结合图分析评估3D连通性，可以更好地评估SR模型的性能。结果表明，不同模型在处理弱强度特征和图像生成非线性方面存在差异。

Conclusion: 本研究表明，深度学习超分辨率技术有望提高牙本质小管成像的效率和质量，但需要结合生物学驱动的评估方法（如基于连通组件和图分析的方法）来准确评估模型性能，而不是仅仅依赖标准IQA指标。

Abstract: The mechanosensory system of teeth is currently believed to partly rely on
Odontoblast cells stimulation by fluid flow through a porosity network
extending through dentin. Visualizing the smallest sub-microscopic porosity
vessels therefore requires the highest achievable resolution from confocal
fluorescence microscopy, the current gold standard. This considerably limits
the extent of the field of view to very small sample regions. To overcome this
limitation, we tested different deep learning (DL) super-resolution (SR) models
to allow faster experimental acquisitions of lower resolution images and
restore optimal image quality by post-processing. Three supervised 2D SR models
(RCAN, pix2pix, FSRCNN) and one unsupervised (CycleGAN) were applied to a
unique set of experimentally paired high- and low-resolution confocal images
acquired with different sampling schemes, resulting in a pixel size increase of
x2, x4, x8. Model performance was quantified using a broad set of similarity
and distribution-based image quality assessment (IQA) metrics, which yielded
inconsistent results that mostly contradicted our visual perception. This
raises the question of the relevance of such generic metrics to efficiently
target the specific structure of dental porosity. To resolve this conflicting
information, the generated SR images were segmented taking into account the
specific scales and morphology of the porosity network and analysed by
comparing connected components. Additionally, the capacity of the SR models to
preserve 3D porosity connectivity throughout the confocal image stacks was
evaluated using graph analysis. This biology-driven assessment allowed a far
better mechanistic interpretation of SR performance, highlighting differences
in model sensitivity to weak intensity features and the impact of non-linearity
in image generation, which explains the failure of standard IQA metrics.

</details>


### [338] [Prompts Generalize with Low Data: Non-vacuous Generalization Bounds for Optimizing Prompts with More Informative Priors](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08413)
*David Madras,Joshua Safyan,Qiuyi,Zhang*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: 提示工程技术在少量任务特定数据和大型提示空间中优化时很成功，这可以通过PAC-贝叶斯理论解释，但仅在数据丰富的场景下有效。本文认为，通过更仔细地考虑数据或依赖于分布的困惑度，可以将这种广泛的成功更全面地解释为一种有效的先验，并引导优化过程朝着对当前任务更“自然”的提示。我们推导出了新的泛化界限，这些界限通过更有用的先验在数据稀疏的提示优化中是有效的，并正式分析了困惑度正则化如何通过限制探索来收紧这些界限。在实践中，我们探索了界限的有效性以及困惑度正则化在改善提示泛化方面的实际好处。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 许多提示工程技术在实践中取得了成功，即使在优化大型提示空间和少量任务特定数据的情况下也是如此。现有研究通过将PAC-贝叶斯理论应用于离散提示空间来解释这种成功，但这些理论仅在数据丰富的场景下才有效。

Method: 本文提出了一种更全面地解释提示工程广泛成功的方法，即通过更仔细地考虑数据或依赖于分布的困惑度。作者推导了新的泛化界限，这些界限对于数据稀疏的提示优化是有效的，并分析了困惑度正则化如何通过限制探索来收紧这些界限。

Result: 本文通过困惑度正则化，在数据稀疏的情况下，提供了有效的提示优化方法，并改善了提示泛化。实验证明了该方法在界限有效性和实际应用中的优势。

Conclusion: 通过引入数据或依赖于分布的困惑度，并推导出新的泛化界限，本文为提示工程在数据稀疏场景下的成功提供了更完善的解释，并提出了实用的困惑度正则化方法来改善提示泛化。

Abstract: Many prompt engineering techniques have been successful in practice, even
when optimizing over a large prompt space with with a small amount of
task-specific data. Recent work has partially explained this success by showing
generalization bounds which apply PAC-Bayes theory to the discrete prompt
space, but they are non-vacuous only in data-rich scenarios. We argue that such
widespread success can be more fully explained through more carefully
considering data- or distribution-dependent perplexity, which acts as an
effective prior and steers the optimization towards prompts that are more
``natural'' for the task at hand. We derive novel generalization bounds that
are non-vacuous for data-scarce prompt optimization via more useful priors,
formally analyzing how perplexity regularization tightens these bounds by
limiting exploration. Empirically, we explore both the bounds' effectiveness
and the practical benefits of perplexity regularization in improving prompt
generalization.

</details>


### [339] [Reinforcing Diffusion Models by Direct Group Preference Optimization](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08425)
*Yihong Luo,Tianyang Hu,Jing Tang*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: DGPO是一种新的在线强化学习算法，可以直接从组级偏好中学习，从而更有效地训练扩散模型，速度比现有方法快20倍，并且在各种评估指标上均优于现有方法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 将强化学习方法（如GRPO）应用于扩散模型存在挑战，因为GRPO需要随机策略，而最有效的扩散采样器是确定性的ODE。现有的解决方案（如基于SDE的采样器）效率低下且收敛速度慢。

Method: DGPO是一种新的在线强化学习算法，直接从组级偏好中学习，利用组内样本的相对信息。它摒弃了策略梯度框架，无需随机策略，从而可以使用高效的确定性ODE采样器。

Result: DGPO的训练速度比现有最先进的方法快约20倍，并在模型内和模型外的奖励指标上都取得了更好的性能。

Conclusion: DGPO克服了将强化学习应用于扩散模型的挑战，通过直接从组级偏好中学习，避免了对随机策略的需求，从而实现了更快的训练速度和更高的性能。

Abstract: While reinforcement learning methods such as Group Relative Preference
Optimization (GRPO) have significantly enhanced Large Language Models, adapting
them to diffusion models remains challenging. In particular, GRPO demands a
stochastic policy, yet the most cost-effective diffusion samplers are based on
deterministic ODEs. Recent work addresses this issue by using inefficient
SDE-based samplers to induce stochasticity, but this reliance on model-agnostic
Gaussian noise leads to slow convergence. To resolve this conflict, we propose
Direct Group Preference Optimization (DGPO), a new online RL algorithm that
dispenses with the policy-gradient framework entirely. DGPO learns directly
from group-level preferences, which utilize relative information of samples
within groups. This design eliminates the need for inefficient stochastic
policies, unlocking the use of efficient deterministic ODE samplers and faster
training. Extensive results show that DGPO trains around 20 times faster than
existing state-of-the-art methods and achieves superior performance on both
in-domain and out-of-domain reward metrics. Code is available at
https://github.com/Luo-Yihong/DGPO.

</details>


### [340] [ClauseLens: Clause-Grounded, CVaR-Constrained Reinforcement Learning for Trustworthy Reinsurance Pricing](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08429)
*Stella C. Dong,James R. Finlay*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: ClauseLens是一个基于强化学习的框架，用于生成透明、合规且风险可控的再保险条约报价，解决了现有报价实践不透明和难以审计的问题。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有再保险条约定价实践不透明，难以审计，且需要满足严格的监管标准。

Method: ClauseLens 将报价任务建模为风险感知约束马尔可夫决策过程（RA-CMDP），从法律和承保语料库中检索法定和政策条款，将其嵌入代理的观察中，用于约束可行操作并生成基于条款的自然语言解释。

Result: 在行业数据校准的多主体条约模拟器中，ClauseLens 将偿付能力违规率降低了 51%，改善了尾部风险表现（CVaR_0.10）27.9%，在基于条款的解释方面达到了 88.2% 的准确率，检索精度为 87.4%，召回率为 91.1%。

Conclusion: 将法律背景嵌入决策和解释路径可以产生可解释、可审计且符合 Solvency II、NAIC RBC 和欧盟人工智能法等监管要求的报价行为。

Abstract: Reinsurance treaty pricing must satisfy stringent regulatory standards, yet
current quoting practices remain opaque and difficult to audit. We introduce
ClauseLens, a clause-grounded reinforcement learning framework that produces
transparent, regulation-compliant, and risk-aware treaty quotes.
  ClauseLens models the quoting task as a Risk-Aware Constrained Markov
Decision Process (RA-CMDP). Statutory and policy clauses are retrieved from
legal and underwriting corpora, embedded into the agent's observations, and
used both to constrain feasible actions and to generate clause-grounded natural
language justifications.
  Evaluated in a multi-agent treaty simulator calibrated to industry data,
ClauseLens reduces solvency violations by 51%, improves tail-risk performance
by 27.9% (CVaR_0.10), and achieves 88.2% accuracy in clause-grounded
explanations with retrieval precision of 87.4% and recall of 91.1%.
  These findings demonstrate that embedding legal context into both decision
and explanation pathways yields interpretable, auditable, and
regulation-aligned quoting behavior consistent with Solvency II, NAIC RBC, and
the EU AI Act.

</details>


### [341] [xRouter: Training Cost-Aware LLMs Orchestration System via Reinforcement Learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08439)
*Cheng Qian,Zuxin Liu,Shirley Kokane,Akshara Prabhakar,Jielin Qiu,Haolin Chen,Zhiwei Liu,Heng Ji,Weiran Yao,Shelby Heinecke,Silvio Savarese,Caiming Xiong,Huan Wang*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: xRouter是一个基于工具调用的学习型路由系统，通过端到端的强化学习来优化成本效益，实现了显著的成本降低和可比的任务完成率。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有LLM部署在成本和性能之间存在权衡：高级模型推理能力强但成本高，轻量级模型成本低但复杂任务易出错。静态规则和关键字启发式方法无法充分利用成本-性能谱，也无法适应不同类型的任务。

Method: 提出xRouter，一个基于工具调用的路由系统，学习型路由器可以直接回答或调用一个或多个外部模型。该路由器通过明确的、考虑成本的奖励进行端到端强化学习，该奖励编码了成本-性能的权衡，无需手动设计路由规则。该实现包括完整的强化学习框架（奖励和成本核算）以及部署和评估流程。

Result: 在各种基准测试中，xRouter在成本效益方面取得了显著的成果（例如，在可比的任务完成率下大幅降低了成本），并提供了关于学习型路由有效因素的实证见解，包括模型的可训练性以及在小型开放模型中引发复杂编排行为的难度。

Conclusion: xRouter是一个学习型、成本感知的LLM编排系统，通过端到端的强化学习优化成本效益，并在各种基准测试中实现了显著的成本降低和可比的任务完成率。作者希望这些发现和开源实现能够为推进LLM编排提供一个实际的平台。

Abstract: Modern LLM deployments confront a widening cost-performance spectrum: premium
models deliver strong reasoning but are expensive, while lightweight models are
economical yet brittle on complex tasks. Static escalation rules and keyword
heuristics under-utilize this spectrum and fail to adapt across task types. We
present xRouter, a tool-calling-based routing system in which a learned router
can either answer directly or invoke one or more external models. The router is
trained end-to-end with reinforcement learning using an explicit, cost-aware
reward that encodes cost-performance trade-offs, eliminating the need for
hand-engineered routing rules. Our implementation encompasses the full
reinforcement learning framework, including reward and cost accounting, as well
as the deployment and evaluation pipelines. Across diverse benchmarks, xRouter
achieves strong cost-performance trade-offs (e.g., substantial cost reductions
at comparable task completion rates), and provides empirical insights into what
reliably helps learned routing and what does not, ranging from model
trainability to the difficulty of eliciting sophisticated orchestration
behaviors in small open models. We hope these findings and our open
implementation will serve as a practical substrate for advancing learned,
cost-aware LLM orchestration.

</details>


### [342] [Synthetic Series-Symbol Data Generation for Time Series Foundation Models](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08445)
*Wenxuan Wang,Kai Wu,Yujian Betterest Li,Dan Wang,Xiaoyu Zhang*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种名为SymTime的基于时间序列与符号表达式配对数据的新型基础模型，用于解决时间序列分析（TSA）中数据稀疏和不平衡的挑战，并在五项主要TSA任务中表现出与真实世界数据集预训练模型相当的性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 时间序列分析（TSA）领域的基础模型发展受到训练数据稀缺和不平衡的限制。本研究旨在克服这些挑战，以提高TSA模型的性能。

Method: 研究设计了一种系列-符号数据生成机制，用于生成成对的时间序列数据和符号表达式。基于此，开发了一个名为SymTime的基础模型，该模型利用符号信息来增强时间序列表示。通过对下游任务进行微调，SymTime模型在五项主要的TSA任务上进行了评估。

Result: SymTime模型在五项主要的TSA任务上取得了有竞争力（competitive）的性能，其表现与在真实世界数据集上预训练的基础模型相当。

Conclusion: 系列-符号数据生成和预训练机制在克服数据稀缺和提升TSA任务性能方面具有巨大潜力。

Abstract: Foundation models for time series analysis (TSA) have attracted significant
attention. However, challenges such as training data scarcity and imbalance
continue to hinder their development. Inspired by complex dynamic system
theories, we design a series-symbol data generation mechanism, enabling the
unrestricted creation of high-quality time series data paired with
corresponding symbolic expressions. To leverage series-symbol data pairs with
strong correlations, we develop \texttt{SymTime}, a pre-trained foundation
model for enhancing time series representation using symbolic information.
\texttt{SymTime} demonstrates competitive performance across five major TSA
tasks when fine-tunes with downstream tasks, rivaling foundation models
pre-trained on real-world datasets. This approach underscores the potential of
series-symbol data generation and pretraining mechanisms in overcoming data
scarcity and enhancing task performance. The code is available at
https://github.com/wwhenxuan/SymTime.

</details>


### [343] [gLSTM: Mitigating Over-Squashing by Increasing Storage Capacity](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08450)
*Hugh Blayney,Álvaro Arroyo,Xiaowen Dong,Michael M. Bronstein*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: GNNs suffer from over-squashing due to information bottleneck. This paper re-examines over-squashing through model capacity, introduces a new task to demonstrate the bottleneck, and proposes a novel GNN architecture inspired by sequence modeling to improve capacity, showing strong performance on synthetic and real-world tasks.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: GNNs suffer from over-squashing, limiting their performance by collapsing information from large receptive fields into fixed-size vectors. This paper aims to re-examine this phenomenon by analyzing it through the lens of model storage and retrieval capacity.

Method: The paper re-examines over-squashing by defining and measuring model capacity. It introduces a new synthetic task to demonstrate the information bottleneck and adapts ideas from sequence modeling (associative memories, fast weight programmers, xLSTM) to develop a novel GNN architecture with improved capacity.

Result: The proposed GNN architecture demonstrates strong performance on both the newly introduced capacity synthetic task and a range of real-world graph benchmarks, indicating improved capacity and a mitigation of the over-squashing problem.

Conclusion: The paper successfully re-examines the over-squashing phenomenon in GNNs by introducing the concept of model capacity. A novel GNN architecture, inspired by sequence modeling techniques, is proposed and shown to effectively address the information bottleneck and improve performance on various tasks.

Abstract: Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) leverage the graph structure to transmit
information between nodes, typically through the message-passing mechanism.
While these models have found a wide variety of applications, they are known to
suffer from over-squashing, where information from a large receptive field of
node representations is collapsed into a single fixed sized vector, resulting
in an information bottleneck. In this paper, we re-examine the over-squashing
phenomenon through the lens of model storage and retrieval capacity, which we
define as the amount of information that can be stored in a node's
representation for later use. We study some of the limitations of existing
tasks used to measure over-squashing and introduce a new synthetic task to
demonstrate that an information bottleneck can saturate this capacity.
Furthermore, we adapt ideas from the sequence modeling literature on
associative memories, fast weight programmers, and the xLSTM model to develop a
novel GNN architecture with improved capacity. We demonstrate strong
performance of this architecture both on our capacity synthetic task, as well
as a range of real-world graph benchmarks.

</details>


### [344] [Integral Signatures of Activation Functions: A 9-Dimensional Taxonomy and Stability Theory for Deep Learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08456)
*Ankur Mali,Lawrence Hall,Jake Williams,Gordon Richards*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: 提出了一个包含九维积分特征S_sigma(phi)的激活函数分类框架，用于评估表达能力和稳定性，并对八种标准激活函数进行了分类。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有激活函数的比较很大程度上是启发式的，缺乏严谨的理论框架。

Method: 提出了一个包含高斯传播统计、渐进行斜率和正则性度量的九维积分特征S_sigma(phi)的分类框架，并从核的角度推导了无量纲Hessian界，将平滑度与phi'的有界变差联系起来。

Result: 对八种标准激活函数（ReLU、leaky-ReLU、tanh、sigmoid、Swish、GELU、Mish、TeLU）进行了分类，证明了饱和、线性增长和平滑族之间的清晰区别，并通过数值高斯-厄米特和蒙特卡洛验证了理论预测。

Conclusion: 该框架提供了原则性的设计指导，将激活函数的选择从试错法转变为可证明的稳定性和核条件。

Abstract: Activation functions govern the expressivity and stability of neural
networks, yet existing comparisons remain largely heuristic. We propose a
rigorous framework for their classification via a nine-dimensional integral
signature S_sigma(phi), combining Gaussian propagation statistics (m1, g1, g2,
m2, eta), asymptotic slopes (alpha_plus, alpha_minus), and regularity measures
(TV(phi'), C(phi)). This taxonomy establishes well-posedness, affine
reparameterization laws with bias, and closure under bounded slope variation.
Dynamical analysis yields Lyapunov theorems with explicit descent constants and
identifies variance stability regions through (m2', g2). From a kernel
perspective, we derive dimension-free Hessian bounds and connect smoothness to
bounded variation of phi'. Applying the framework, we classify eight standard
activations (ReLU, leaky-ReLU, tanh, sigmoid, Swish, GELU, Mish, TeLU), proving
sharp distinctions between saturating, linear-growth, and smooth families.
Numerical Gauss-Hermite and Monte Carlo validation confirms theoretical
predictions. Our framework provides principled design guidance, moving
activation choice from trial-and-error to provable stability and kernel
conditioning.

</details>


### [345] [SummDiff: Generative Modeling of Video Summarization with Diffusion](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08458)
*Kwanseok Kim,Jaehoon Hahm,Sumin Kim,Jinhwan Sul,Byunghak Kim,Joonseok Lee*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: 视频摘要任务旨在通过选择帧的子集来缩短视频，同时保留其关键时刻。以往的方法忽略了摘要的主观性，将视频摘要视为一个条件生成任务，并首次采用扩散模型。SummDiff 能够生成符合不同人类视点的多个摘要，并在各种基准测试中实现了最先进的性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 以往的视频摘要方法忽略了摘要固有的主观性，而是将不同评分者的评分平均化。本文提出将视频摘要视为一个条件生成任务，以反映人类的不同视角。

Method: 使用扩散模型将视频摘要视为一个条件生成任务，动态适应视觉上下文并生成多个候选摘要。

Result: SummDiff 在各种基准测试中达到了最先进的性能，并生成了与单个注释者偏好一致的摘要。此外，还通过对背包问题（生成摘要的重要最后一步）的新颖指标进行了更深入的分析。

Conclusion: SummDiff 能够生成符合不同人类视点的多个摘要，并在各种基准测试中达到了最先进的性能，表明其在处理视频摘要任务中的主观性方面具有优越性。

Abstract: Video summarization is a task of shortening a video by choosing a subset of
frames while preserving its essential moments. Despite the innate subjectivity
of the task, previous works have deterministically regressed to an averaged
frame score over multiple raters, ignoring the inherent subjectivity of what
constitutes a good summary. We propose a novel problem formulation by framing
video summarization as a conditional generation task, allowing a model to learn
the distribution of good summaries and to generate multiple plausible summaries
that better reflect varying human perspectives. Adopting diffusion models for
the first time in video summarization, our proposed method, SummDiff,
dynamically adapts to visual contexts and generates multiple candidate
summaries conditioned on the input video. Extensive experiments demonstrate
that SummDiff not only achieves the state-of-the-art performance on various
benchmarks but also produces summaries that closely align with individual
annotator preferences. Moreover, we provide a deeper insight with novel metrics
from an analysis of the knapsack, which is an important last step of generating
summaries but has been overlooked in evaluation.

</details>


### [346] [In-Context Clustering with Large Language Models](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08466)
*Ying Wang,Mengye Ren,Andrew Gordon Wilson*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: ICC 是一种基于 LLM 的聚类方法，可处理不同分布的数据，利用注意力机制捕捉复杂关系。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统聚类算法受限于预定义相似性度量，而 ICC 旨在利用 LLM 的注意力机制灵活捕捉输入间的复杂关系，以实现对不同分布数据的聚类。

Method: ICC 利用 LLM 的注意力机制来捕捉数据间的复杂关系。对于文本编码的数值数据，研究者们发现预训练 LLM 具有出色的零样本聚类能力，并且其注意力矩阵能够揭示显著的聚类模式。此外，他们还通过使用下句预测（NTP）损失对 LLM 进行微调，以增强其在数值和图像数据上的聚类能力。ICC 的灵活性还体现在提示工程方面，使得文本条件图像聚类成为可能。

Result: 研究表明，基于 LLM 注意力矩阵的谱聚类方法具有与传统方法相媲美的性能。通过 NTP 损失微调的 LLM 在数值和图像数据上的聚类能力得到提升。ICC 还能实现文本条件图像聚类，这是传统方法难以做到的。

Conclusion: ICC 将上下文学习（in-context learning）扩展到无监督学习领域，证明了 LLM 在聚类任务上的有效性和灵活性。

Abstract: We propose In-Context Clustering (ICC), a flexible LLM-based procedure for
clustering data from diverse distributions. Unlike traditional clustering
algorithms constrained by predefined similarity measures, ICC flexibly captures
complex relationships among inputs through an attention mechanism. We show that
pretrained LLMs exhibit impressive zero-shot clustering capabilities on
text-encoded numeric data, with attention matrices showing salient cluster
patterns. Spectral clustering using attention matrices offers surprisingly
competitive performance. We further enhance the clustering capabilities of LLMs
on numeric and image data through fine-tuning using the Next Token Prediction
(NTP) loss. Moreover, the flexibility of LLM prompting enables text-conditioned
image clustering, a capability that classical clustering methods lack. Our work
extends in-context learning to an unsupervised setting, showcasing the
effectiveness and flexibility of LLMs for clustering. Our code is available at
https://agenticlearning.ai/icc.

</details>


### [347] [Better Together: Leveraging Unpaired Multimodal Data for Stronger Unimodal Models](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08492)
*Sharut Gupta,Shobhita Sundaram,Chenyu Wang,Stefanie Jegelka,Phillip Isola*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种名为UML（Unpaired Multimodal Learner）的训练范式，利用不成对的多模态数据来增强单一模态表示学习，从而提高下游任务的性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统多模态学习依赖配对数据集，但本文旨在探索如何利用不成对的辅助多模态数据直接增强目标模态的表示学习。

Method: UML是一种模型无关的训练范式，通过参数共享让单个模型交替处理来自不同模态的输入，利用不同模态是共享底层现实投影的假设，在无显式配对的情况下进行跨模态学习。

Result: 理论上，在 Assume 线性数据生成模型的情况下，证明了不成对的辅助数据可以产生比单模态训练更具信息量的表示。实验上，在图像和音频等多种单模态目标任务上，使用文本、音频或图像等辅助模态的不成对数据，能够一致地提高下游性能。

Conclusion: UML 训练范式能够有效地利用不成对的多模态数据来提升单模态任务的表现，为多模态学习提供了新的方向。

Abstract: Traditional multimodal learners find unified representations for tasks like
visual question answering, but rely heavily on paired datasets. However, an
overlooked yet potentially powerful question is: can one leverage auxiliary
unpaired multimodal data to directly enhance representation learning in a
target modality? We introduce UML: Unpaired Multimodal Learner, a
modality-agnostic training paradigm in which a single model alternately
processes inputs from different modalities while sharing parameters across
them. This design exploits the assumption that different modalities are
projections of a shared underlying reality, allowing the model to benefit from
cross-modal structure without requiring explicit pairs. Theoretically, under
linear data-generating assumptions, we show that unpaired auxiliary data can
yield representations strictly more informative about the data-generating
process than unimodal training. Empirically, we show that using unpaired data
from auxiliary modalities -- such as text, audio, or images -- consistently
improves downstream performance across diverse unimodal targets such as image
and audio. Our project page: https://unpaired-multimodal.github.io/

</details>


### [348] [Convergence Theorems for Entropy-Regularized and Distributional Reinforcement Learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08526)
*Yash Jhaveri,Harley Wiltzer,Patrick Shafto,Marc G. Bellemare,David Meger*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: RL方法通常只关注预期回报，忽略了学习策略的特性，导致难以理解和预测策略行为。本研究提出了一个策略优化理论框架，通过熵正则化和温度解耦保证收敛到特定最优策略，生成可解释、保留多样性的策略，并能精确估计其回报分布。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的强化学习方法在追求最优策略时，往往忽视了学习策略本身的特性，除了预期的回报之外，缺乏对其行为的表征和理解。这导致即使在成功的情况下，也难以清晰地知道学习到的具体策略是什么，以及它将如何行动。

Method: 提出一个策略优化理论框架，利用逐渐减小的熵正则化和一种称为‘温度解耦’（temperature decoupling）的技术，来保证算法收敛到一个特定的最优策略。

Result: 该方法能够生成一个可解释的、保留多样性的最优策略，并且随着正则化温度趋近于零，该策略的特性得到保证。此外，该方法还能确保策略导出的对象（如值函数和回报分布）的收敛性。一个具体的例子是，生成的策略会均匀地采样所有最优动作。

Conclusion: 该理论框架通过熵正则化和温度解耦，实现了可解释、多样化的最优策略，并能精确估计回报分布，解决了强化学习中策略可理解性和多样性不足的问题。

Abstract: In the pursuit of finding an optimal policy, reinforcement learning (RL)
methods generally ignore the properties of learned policies apart from their
expected return. Thus, even when successful, it is difficult to characterize
which policies will be learned and what they will do. In this work, we present
a theoretical framework for policy optimization that guarantees convergence to
a particular optimal policy, via vanishing entropy regularization and a
temperature decoupling gambit. Our approach realizes an interpretable,
diversity-preserving optimal policy as the regularization temperature vanishes
and ensures the convergence of policy derived objects--value functions and
return distributions. In a particular instance of our method, for example, the
realized policy samples all optimal actions uniformly. Leveraging our
temperature decoupling gambit, we present an algorithm that estimates, to
arbitrary accuracy, the return distribution associated to its interpretable,
diversity-preserving optimal policy.

</details>


### [349] [On the optimization dynamics of RLVR: Gradient gap and step size thresholds](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08539)
*Joe Suk,Yaqi Duan*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: RLVR使用二元反馈微调LLM，但理论基础不明确。本文建立了RLVR的理论基础，分析了其完整响应和token级别的训练过程。引入“梯度鸿沟”量化从低奖励到高奖励区域的改进方向，证明了收敛性依赖于更新方向与梯度鸿沟的对齐。推导了基于梯度鸿沟幅度的步长阈值，低于该阈值则收敛，高于则性能崩溃。理论还预测了临界步长如何随响应长度和成功率变化，解释了长度归一化等实用方法的有效性，并表明在固定学习率下，成功率会停滞在100%以下。通过模拟和LLM实验（包括Qwen2.5-7B的GRPO训练）验证了这些预测。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: RLVR在微调LLM方面取得了显著的经验成功，但缺乏对其工作原理的理论理解。

Method: 通过分析完整响应（轨迹）和token级别的训练过程，并引入“梯度鸿沟”来形式化从低奖励到高奖励区域的改进方向，来建立RLVR的理论基础。

Result: 证明了收敛性依赖于更新方向与梯度鸿沟的对齐，并推导了基于梯度鸿沟幅度的步长阈值。理论预测了临界步长如何随响应长度和成功率变化，解释了实用技巧的有效性，并指出成功率可能停滞在100%以下。通过模拟和LLM实验验证了这些预测。

Conclusion: RLVR的理论基础已建立，其收敛性和性能受梯度鸿沟和步长阈值影响。理论预测与实验结果一致。

Abstract: Reinforcement Learning with Verifiable Rewards (RLVR), which uses simple
binary feedback to post-train large language models, has shown significant
empirical success. However, a principled understanding of why it works has been
lacking. This paper builds a theoretical foundation for RLVR by analyzing its
training process at both the full-response (trajectory) and token levels.
Central to our analysis is a quantity called the Gradient Gap, which formalizes
the direction of improvement from low-reward to high-reward regions of the
response space. We prove that convergence critically depends on aligning the
update direction with this Gradient Gap. Moreover, we derive a sharp step-size
threshold based on the magnitude of the Gradient Gap: below it, learning
converges, whereas above it, performance collapses. Our theory further predicts
how the critical step size must scale with response length and the success
rate, thereby explaining why practical heuristics such as length normalization
improve stability and showing that, with a fixed learning rate, the success
rate can stagnate strictly below $100\%$. We validate these predictions through
controlled bandit simulations and LLM experiments, including training
Qwen2.5-7B with GRPO.

</details>


### [350] [Entropy Regularizing Activation: Boosting Continuous Control, Large Language Models, and Image Classification with Activation as Entropy Constraints](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08549)
*Zilin Kang,Chonghua Liao,Tingqiang Xu,Huazhe Xu*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: ERA是一种通过对模型输出应用特殊激活来约束采样熵的新范式，在LLMs、强化学习和图像分类等领域均有效，同时计算开销小。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 本文提出了一种新的范式ERA，旨在通过对模型输出应用特殊的激活函数来约束采样熵，以期提高模型在不同领域的性能。

Method: ERA范式通过对模型输出应用特殊的激活函数来约束采样熵。

Result: ERA在LLMs方面，将Qwen2.5-Math-7B的AIME 2025分数提高了37.4%；在连续控制强化学习方面，在HumanoidBench上比SAC等基线提高了30%以上；在图像分类方面，将ResNet-50在ImageNet上的top-1准确率提高了0.69%，同时计算开销小于7%。

Conclusion: 研究结果表明，输出激活是控制熵的有效工具，为设计更简单、更鲁棒的算法开辟了新方向。

Abstract: We propose ERA, a new paradigm that constrains the sampling entropy above
given thresholds by applying specially designed activations to the outputs of
models. Our approach demonstrates broad effectiveness across different domains:
1) for large language models(LLMs), boosting the AIME 2025 score for
Qwen2.5-Math-7B by 37.4%; 2) for continuous control reinforcement learning
agents, improving performance by more than 30% over strong baselines such as
SAC on the challenging HumanoidBench; 3) for image classification, enhancing
ImageNet top-1 accuracy by 0.69% for ResNet-50. These gains are achieved with a
computational overhead of less than 7%. Our work validates output activation as
a powerful tool for entropy control, opening a new direction for designing
simpler and more robust algorithms.

</details>


### [351] [Improving Reasoning for Diffusion Language Models via Group Diffusion Policy Optimization](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08554)
*Kevin Rojas,Jiahe Lin,Kashif Rasul,Anderson Schneider,Yuriy Nevmyvaka,Molei Tao,Wei Deng*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: DLMs are a flexible alternative to autoregressive LLMs but adapting RL fine-tuning is challenging due to intractable likelihood. This paper introduces Group Diffusion Policy Optimization (GDPO), a new RL algorithm for DLMs that uses integral approximations to reduce variance in ELBO estimation, achieving consistent gains over baselines on math, reasoning, and coding benchmarks.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Adapting reinforcement learning (RL) fine-tuning to Diffusion Language Models (DLMs) is an open challenge because of their intractable likelihood, and existing methods like diffu-GRPO have limitations.

Method: This paper revisits ELBO estimation for DLMs, decomposes its sources of variance, and introduces Group Diffusion Policy Optimization (GDPO). GDPO uses Semi-deterministic Monte Carlo schemes for fast, deterministic integral approximations to reduce variance in ELBO estimation, providing a lower-variance estimator under budget constraints.

Result: GDPO achieves consistent gains over pretrained checkpoints and outperforms the state-of-the-art baseline, diffu-GRPO, on the majority of math, reasoning, and coding benchmarks.

Conclusion: GDPO offers an effective RL algorithm for DLMs by addressing the variance issue in ELBO estimation through novel integral approximation techniques, demonstrating strong empirical performance on various benchmarks.

Abstract: Diffusion language models (DLMs) enable parallel, order-agnostic generation
with iterative refinement, offering a flexible alternative to autoregressive
large language models (LLMs). However, adapting reinforcement learning (RL)
fine-tuning to DLMs remains an open challenge because of the intractable
likelihood. Pioneering work such as diffu-GRPO estimated token-level
likelihoods via one-step unmasking. While computationally efficient, this
approach is severely biased. A more principled foundation lies in
sequence-level likelihoods, where the evidence lower bound (ELBO) serves as a
surrogate. Yet, despite this clean mathematical connection, ELBO-based methods
have seen limited adoption due to the prohibitive cost of likelihood
evaluation. In this work, we revisit ELBO estimation and disentangle its
sources of variance. This decomposition motivates reducing variance through
fast, deterministic integral approximations along a few pivotal dimensions.
Building on this insight, we introduce \textbf{Group Diffusion Policy
Optimization (GDPO)}, a new RL algorithm tailored for DLMs. GDPO leverages
simple yet effective Semi-deterministic Monte Carlo schemes to mitigate the
variance explosion of ELBO estimators under vanilla double Monte Carlo
sampling, yielding a provably lower-variance estimator under tight evaluation
budgets. Empirically, GDPO achieves consistent gains over pretrained
checkpoints and outperforms diffu-GRPO, one of the state-of-the-art baselines,
on the majority of math, reasoning, and coding benchmarks.

</details>


### [352] [Who Said Neural Networks Aren't Linear?](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08570)
*Nimrod Berman,Assaf Hallak,Assaf Shocher*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: 通过构造逆变换神经网络，可以将非线性映射转化为线性映射，从而应用线性代数工具，并加速扩散模型采样。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 探索是否存在非标准向量空间，使得看似非线性的神经网络函数实际上是线性的。

Method: 通过在可逆神经网络（gx和gy）之间嵌入线性算子（A）来构造线性化器（Linearizer），即f(x)=gy⁻¹(A gx(x))，并定义新的加法和标量乘法。

Result: 发现线性化器框架使得线性代数工具（如SVD、伪逆、正交投影）可应用于非线性映射，且两个线性化器的组合（共享一个神经网络）仍然是线性化器。利用此性质，将扩散模型的采样步骤从数百步压缩到一步，并实现了具有全局投影性质的生成模型和模块化风格迁移。

Conclusion: 提出的线性化器框架能够将非线性映射转化为线性映射，从而为非线性模型带来线性代数的强大工具，并能显著提升扩散模型的效率和实现新的生成模型功能。

Abstract: Neural networks are famously nonlinear. However, linearity is defined
relative to a pair of vector spaces, $f$$:$$X$$\to$$Y$. Is it possible to
identify a pair of non-standard vector spaces for which a conventionally
nonlinear function is, in fact, linear? This paper introduces a method that
makes such vector spaces explicit by construction. We find that if we sandwich
a linear operator $A$ between two invertible neural networks, $f(x)=g_y^{-1}(A
g_x(x))$, then the corresponding vector spaces $X$ and $Y$ are induced by newly
defined addition and scaling actions derived from $g_x$ and $g_y$. We term this
kind of architecture a Linearizer. This framework makes the entire arsenal of
linear algebra, including SVD, pseudo-inverse, orthogonal projection and more,
applicable to nonlinear mappings. Furthermore, we show that the composition of
two Linearizers that share a neural network is also a Linearizer. We leverage
this property and demonstrate that training diffusion models using our
architecture makes the hundreds of sampling steps collapse into a single step.
We further utilize our framework to enforce idempotency (i.e. $f(f(x))=f(x)$)
on networks leading to a globally projective generative model and to
demonstrate modular style transfer.

</details>


<div id='cs.GR'></div>

# cs.GR [[Back]](#toc)

### [353] [SpotDiff: Spotting and Disentangling Interference in Feature Space for Subject-Preserving Image Generation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07340)
*Yongzhi Li,Saining Zhang,Yibing Chen,Boying Li,Yanxin Zhang,Xiaoyu Du*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: SpotDiff是一种创新的学习方法，通过分离干扰来提取特定于主体的特征，从而在高效生成个性化图像的同时，保持主体身份的高度保真度。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的个性化图像生成方法要么计算成本高昂（基于优化的方法），要么在保真度上有所牺牲（基于学习的方法，易受干扰因素影响）。本研究旨在开发一种既高效又能忠实保留主体身份的图像生成方法。

Method: SpotDiff利用预训练的CLIP图像编码器和专门的专家网络（用于姿态和背景），通过在特征空间中引入正交性约束，分离出主体的身份特征，从而实现对干扰的识别和分离。此外，研究者还构建了一个包含10,000个训练样本的数据集SpotDiff10k，以支持该方法的训练。

Result: 实验表明，SpotDiff在保持主体身份和可控编辑方面优于现有方法，并且仅使用10,000个训练样本就能达到具有竞争力的性能。

Conclusion: SpotDiff通过其新颖的特征分离机制，在保持主体身份的同时实现了高效且可控的个性化图像生成，为该领域的研究提供了一个有前景的方向。

Abstract: Personalized image generation aims to faithfully preserve a reference
subject's identity while adapting to diverse text prompts. Existing
optimization-based methods ensure high fidelity but are computationally
expensive, while learning-based approaches offer efficiency at the cost of
entangled representations influenced by nuisance factors. We introduce
SpotDiff, a novel learning-based method that extracts subject-specific features
by spotting and disentangling interference. Leveraging a pre-trained CLIP image
encoder and specialized expert networks for pose and background, SpotDiff
isolates subject identity through orthogonality constraints in the feature
space. To enable principled training, we introduce SpotDiff10k, a curated
dataset with consistent pose and background variations. Experiments demonstrate
that SpotDiff achieves more robust subject preservation and controllable
editing than prior methods, while attaining competitive performance with only
10k training samples.

</details>


### [354] [Local MAP Sampling for Diffusion Models](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07343)
*Shaorong Zhang,Rob Brekelmans,Greg Ver Steeg*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: DPS 是一种贝叶斯方法，但反问题求解的目标是精确重建，而优化方法在这方面表现更好。LMAPS 是一种新的推理框架，通过迭代解决局部 MAP 子问题来连接全局 MAP 估计和 DPS，并提供统一的概率解释。LMAPS 在图像恢复和科学任务中取得了最先进的性能，包括在运动去模糊、JPEG 恢复和量化方面提高了 2 dB，在逆散射方面提高了 1.5 dB。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 反问题求解的目标是获得最精确的重建，而现有的 DPS 方法虽然有概率基础，但在实际应用中不如优化方法。因此，需要一种能够连接概率解释和优化方法优势的新框架。

Method: 提出了一种名为局部 MAP Sampling (LMAPS) 的新推理框架，该框架通过迭代地解决局部 MAP 子问题来获得反问题的解。这种方法将优化方法与全局 MAP 估计和 DPS 联系起来，并提供了一个统一的概率解释。

Result: LMAPS 在运动去模糊、JPEG 恢复和量化方面取得了 $\geq 2$ dB 的性能提升，在逆散射方面取得了 $>1.5$ dB 的性能提升，在广泛的图像恢复和科学任务中实现了最先进的性能。

Conclusion: LMAPS 框架能够提供对优化方法（如局部 MAP 估计）的概率解释，并能通过改进的算法在各种反问题中取得最先进的性能。

Abstract: Diffusion Posterior Sampling (DPS) provides a principled Bayesian approach to
inverse problems by sampling from $p(x_0 \mid y)$. However, in practice, the
goal of inverse problem solving is not to cover the posterior but to recover
the most accurate reconstruction, where optimization-based diffusion solvers
often excel despite lacking a clear probabilistic foundation. We introduce
Local MAP Sampling (LMAPS), a new inference framework that iteratively solving
local MAP subproblems along the diffusion trajectory. This perspective
clarifies their connection to global MAP estimation and DPS, offering a unified
probabilistic interpretation for optimization-based methods. Building on this
foundation, we develop practical algorithms with a probabilistically
interpretable covariance approximation, a reformulated objective for stability
and interpretability, and a gradient approximation for non-differentiable
operators. Across a broad set of image restoration and scientific tasks, LMAPS
achieves state-of-the-art performance, including $\geq 2$ dB gains on motion
deblurring, JPEG restoration, and quantization, and $>1.5$ dB improvements on
inverse scattering benchmarks.

</details>


### [355] [Differentiable Variable Fonts](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07638)
*Kinjal Parikh,Danny M. Kaufman,David I. W. Levin,Alec Jacobson*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: 该研究提出了可微分字体，以直观、自动化字体设计和动画。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 自动化文本外观编辑和动画，同时保持可读性和美学，并实现创意表达，但现有方法因需要手动调整字体参数而受到限制。

Method: 将字体规范提炼成数学公式，建立字体参数与矢量图形之间的可微分映射，从而在矢量图形控制点或栅格化图像上定义能量并进行梯度优化。

Result: 开发了一个可微分框架，并展示了其在四种应用中的效用：直接形状操作、感知重叠建模、基于物理的文本动画和自动化字体设计优化。

Conclusion: 该方法利用可微分字体，结合现代设计优化技术，为直观、简便的字体设计和动画工作流开辟了新的可能性。

Abstract: Editing and animating text appearance for graphic designs, commercials, etc.
remain highly skilled tasks requiring detailed, hands on efforts from artists.
Automating these manual workflows requires balancing the competing goals of
maintaining legibility and aesthetics of text, while enabling creative
expression. Variable fonts, recent parametric extensions to traditional fonts,
offer the promise of new ways to ease and automate typographic design and
animation. Variable fonts provide custom constructed parameters along which
fonts can be smoothly varied. These parameterizations could then potentially
serve as high value continuous design spaces, opening the door to automated
design optimization tools. However, currently variable fonts are underutilized
in creative applications, because artists so far still need to manually tune
font parameters. Our work opens the door to intuitive and automated font design
and animation workflows with differentiable variable fonts. To do so we distill
the current variable font specification to a compact mathematical formulation
that differentiably connects the highly non linear, non invertible mapping of
variable font parameters to the underlying vector graphics representing the
text. This enables us to construct a differentiable framework, with respect to
variable font parameters, allowing us to perform gradient based optimization of
energies defined on vector graphics control points, and on target rasterized
images. We demonstrate the utility of this framework with four applications:
direct shape manipulation, overlap aware modeling, physics based text
animation, and automated font design optimization. Our work now enables
leveraging the carefully designed affordances of variable fonts with
differentiability to use modern design optimization technologies, opening new
possibilities for easy and intuitive typographic design workflows.

</details>


### [356] [NRRS: Neural Russian Roulette and Splitting](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07868)
*Haojie Jin,Jierui Ren,Yisong Chen,Guoping Wang,Sheng Li*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: 提出一种改进的俄罗斯轮盘赌和分裂（RRS）方法，以适应GPU的波前路径追踪渲染架构，并引入了基于神经网络学习RRS因子的方法（NRRS和AID-NRRS），通过Mix-Depth机制优化效率，实验证明该方法在渲染质量和性能上优于传统方法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统的RRS方法与波前路径追踪架构不兼容，因为其路径数量不可预测，而波前渲染需要预先分配内存和进行阶段式调度。需要一种新的RRS方法来解决这个问题。

Method: 提出一种归一化的RRS方法，具有有限的路径数量，以实现稳定和内存高效的执行。进一步，提出使用神经网络（NRRS和AID-NRRS）学习RRS因子，该网络明确地结合了RRS归一化。引入Mix-Depth机制，根据路径深度自适应地调节神经网络的评估，以平衡计算成本和推理精度。

Result: 所提出的方法在渲染质量和性能上均优于传统的启发式方法和最近的RRS技术，并且在各种复杂场景下都表现出色。

Conclusion: 所提出的归一化RRS方法和基于神经网络的方法能够有效解决传统RRS与波前路径追踪架构不兼容的问题，并在渲染质量和效率方面取得了显著的提升。

Abstract: We propose a novel framework for Russian Roulette and Splitting (RRS)
tailored to wavefront path tracing, a highly parallel rendering architecture
that processes path states in batched, stage-wise execution for efficient GPU
utilization. Traditional RRS methods, with unpredictable path counts, are
fundamentally incompatible with wavefront's preallocated memory and scheduling
requirements. To resolve this, we introduce a normalized RRS formulation with a
bounded path count, enabling stable and memory-efficient execution.
  Furthermore, we pioneer the use of neural networks to learn RRS factors,
presenting two models: NRRS and AID-NRRS. At a high level, both feature a
carefully designed RRSNet that explicitly incorporates RRS normalization, with
only subtle differences in their implementation. To balance computational cost
and inference accuracy, we introduce Mix-Depth, a path-depth-aware mechanism
that adaptively regulates neural evaluation, further improving efficiency.
  Extensive experiments demonstrate that our method outperforms traditional
heuristics and recent RRS techniques in both rendering quality and performance
across a variety of complex scenes.

</details>


### [357] [Variable-Rate Texture Compression: Real-Time Rendering with JPEG](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08166)
*Elias Kristmann,Markus Schütz,Michael Wimmer*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: JPEG 压缩在现代 GPU 上是可行的，并且在质量和压缩率方面优于 BC1，并能与 ASTC 媲美。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: JPEG 等可变速率压缩格式未能在实时渲染中使用，因为它们需要单独的 texel 访问。

Method: 使用延迟渲染管线，识别并解码给定帧所需的块子集，并为帧缓冲区的像素着色。

Result: 尽管需要每像素额外的 ~0.17 位，但 JPEG 保持了比 BC1 更好的质量和压缩率，并且在某些图像类型上优于或媲美 ASTC。JPEG 渲染管线将渲染时间增加了不到 0.3 毫秒。

Conclusion: 复杂的变速率压缩方案，例如 JPEG，在现代 GPU 上是可行的，甚至在 VR 中也是如此。

Abstract: Although variable-rate compressed image formats such as JPEG are widely used
to efficiently encode images, they have not found their way into real-time
rendering due to special requirements such as random access to individual
texels. In this paper, we investigate the feasibility of variable-rate texture
compression on modern GPUs using the JPEG format, and how it compares to the
GPU-friendly fixed-rate compression approaches BC1 and ASTC. Using a deferred
rendering pipeline, we are able to identify the subset of blocks that are
needed for a given frame, decode these, and colorize the framebuffer's pixels.
Despite the additional $\sim$0.17 bit per pixel that we require for our
approach, JPEG maintains significantly better quality and compression rates
compared to BC1, and depending on the type of image, outperforms or competes
with ASTC. The JPEG rendering pipeline increases rendering duration by less
than 0.3 ms on an RTX 4090, demonstrating that sophisticated variable-rate
compression schemes are feasible on modern GPUs, even in VR. Source code and
data sets are available at: https://github.com/elias1518693/jpeg_textures

</details>


### [358] [SViM3D: Stable Video Material Diffusion for Single Image 3D Generation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08271)
*Andreas Engelhardt,Mark Boss,Vikram Voletti,Chun-Han Yao,Hendrik P. A. Lensch,Varun Jampani*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: SViM3D框架可以根据单张图像预测多视角一致的物理渲染（PBR）材质，通过扩展潜在视频扩散模型来联合输出PBR参数和表面法线，并支持显式相机控制，从而实现重新布光和生成3D资产，在多数据集上展示了先进的性能，并可应用于AR/VR、电影、游戏等领域。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 当前视频扩散模型在从单张图像重建3D物体方面取得了进展，但对于反射率的表示仍依赖于简单的材质模型或需要额外步骤进行估计，这限制了重新布光和外观编辑的能力。SViM3D旨在解决这个问题，通过直接输出PBR材质参数来增强3D重建能力。

Method: SViM3D扩展了一个潜在视频扩散模型，使其能够根据单张输入图像，联合输出每个生成视图的空间变化的PBR参数和表面法线，并结合显式相机控制。该框架引入了多种机制来提高在此类不适定问题中的图像质量。

Result: SViM3D在多视角一致性PBR材质预测方面取得了最先进的性能，能够实现高质量的重新布光和新视角合成，并在多个以物体为中心的数据集上进行了验证。

Conclusion: SViM3D成功地实现了从单张图像生成可重新布光的三维资产，其方法具有良好的泛化能力，可应用于AR/VR、电影、游戏等多种视觉媒体，为三维内容创作提供了新的可能性。

Abstract: We present Stable Video Materials 3D (SViM3D), a framework to predict
multi-view consistent physically based rendering (PBR) materials, given a
single image. Recently, video diffusion models have been successfully used to
reconstruct 3D objects from a single image efficiently. However, reflectance is
still represented by simple material models or needs to be estimated in
additional steps to enable relighting and controlled appearance edits. We
extend a latent video diffusion model to output spatially varying PBR
parameters and surface normals jointly with each generated view based on
explicit camera control. This unique setup allows for relighting and generating
a 3D asset using our model as neural prior. We introduce various mechanisms to
this pipeline that improve quality in this ill-posed setting. We show
state-of-the-art relighting and novel view synthesis performance on multiple
object-centric datasets. Our method generalizes to diverse inputs, enabling the
generation of relightable 3D assets useful in AR/VR, movies, games and other
visual media.

</details>


### [359] [Spectral Prefiltering of Neural Fields](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08394)
*Mustafa B. Yaldiz,Ishit Mehta,Nithin Raghavan,Andreas Meuleman,Tzu-Mao Li,Ravi Ramamoorthi*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: 提出一种可预过滤的神经场优化方法，通过在输入域进行卷积滤波，并支持训练时未见过的参数化滤波器，实现了训练和推理的高效性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的神经场方法通常在单一固定分辨率下运行，限制了其在连续视觉信号表示方面的灵活性。

Method: 通过解析地缩放傅立叶特征嵌入与滤波器频率响应，在输入域执行卷积滤波，并支持高斯、盒状和 Lanczos 等参数化滤波器。使用单样本蒙特卡洛估计来训练神经场。

Result: 实现了比现有方法更优越的定量和定性性能，并且在训练和推理速度上都有显著提升，同时对网络架构没有额外的限制。

Conclusion: 该方法通过在输入域进行卷积滤波，并支持多种滤波器，有效地解决了神经场固定分辨率的问题，并在效率和性能上取得了突破。

Abstract: Neural fields excel at representing continuous visual signals but typically
operate at a single, fixed resolution. We present a simple yet powerful method
to optimize neural fields that can be prefiltered in a single forward pass. Key
innovations and features include: (1) We perform convolutional filtering in the
input domain by analytically scaling Fourier feature embeddings with the
filter's frequency response. (2) This closed-form modulation generalizes beyond
Gaussian filtering and supports other parametric filters (Box and Lanczos) that
are unseen at training time. (3) We train the neural field using single-sample
Monte Carlo estimates of the filtered signal. Our method is fast during both
training and inference, and imposes no additional constraints on the network
architecture. We show quantitative and qualitative improvements over existing
methods for neural-field filtering.

</details>


### [360] [Splat the Net: Radiance Fields with Splattable Neural Primitives](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08491)
*Xilong Zhou,Bao-Huy Nguyen,Loïc Magne,Vladislav Golyanik,Thomas Leimkühler,Christian Theobalt*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: 我们提出了一种新的体积表示方法——可分割神经元基元，它结合了神经模型和基于元基元的分割技术的优点，实现了高质量和高效率的新视角合成。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 神经渲染（如NeRF）虽然表现力强，但渲染速度慢；而基于元基元的（如3D高斯泼溅）虽然速度快，但表现力有限。本研究旨在结合两者的优点。

Method: 提出了一种新的体积表示方法——可分割神经元基元。每个基元包含一个由浅层神经网络参数化的有界神经密度场。这种方法允许对线积分进行精确的解析求解，从而能够高效地计算具有透视精确性的分割核，无需进行耗时的光线步进。

Result: 在新的视角合成基准测试中，我们的方法在质量和速度上均可与3D高斯泼溅相媲美，但使用的基元数量减少了10倍，参数数量减少了6倍。

Conclusion: 可分割神经元基元是一种能够结合神经模型表现力和基于元基元的分割效率的新型体积表示方法，在无需复杂控制或自适应框架的情况下，实现了高质量和高效率的新视角合成。

Abstract: Radiance fields have emerged as a predominant representation for modeling 3D
scene appearance. Neural formulations such as Neural Radiance Fields provide
high expressivity but require costly ray marching for rendering, whereas
primitive-based methods such as 3D Gaussian Splatting offer real-time
efficiency through splatting, yet at the expense of representational power.
Inspired by advances in both these directions, we introduce splattable neural
primitives, a new volumetric representation that reconciles the expressivity of
neural models with the efficiency of primitive-based splatting. Each primitive
encodes a bounded neural density field parameterized by a shallow neural
network. Our formulation admits an exact analytical solution for line
integrals, enabling efficient computation of perspectively accurate splatting
kernels. As a result, our representation supports integration along view rays
without the need for costly ray marching. The primitives flexibly adapt to
scene geometry and, being larger than prior analytic primitives, reduce the
number required per scene. On novel-view synthesis benchmarks, our approach
matches the quality and speed of 3D Gaussian Splatting while using $10\times$
fewer primitives and $6\times$ fewer parameters. These advantages arise
directly from the representation itself, without reliance on complex control or
adaptation frameworks. The project page is
https://vcai.mpi-inf.mpg.de/projects/SplatNet/.

</details>


### [361] [X2Video: Adapting Diffusion Models for Multimodal Controllable Neural Video Rendering](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08530)
*Zhitong Huang,Mohan Zhang,Renhan Wang,Rui Tang,Hao Zhu,Jing Liao*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: X2Video是一个新颖的视频生成模型，首次实现了由反照率、法线、粗糙度、金属度和辐照度等内部通道引导的逼真视频渲染，并支持图像和文本的多模态控制。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有视频生成模型在提供精细控制方面存在不足，尤其是在颜色、材质、几何和光照方面，并且难以生成长视频。X2Video旨在通过结合内部通道引导和多模态控制来解决这些问题，同时保持长期的视觉一致性。

Method: X2Video通过以下方式实现其功能：1. 扩展了XRGB模型以支持视频生成，引入了混合自注意力机制以确保时间一致性并提高对参考图像的保真度。2. 开发了掩码交叉注意力机制，用于区分全局和局部文本提示，并将其分别应用于相应的区域。3. 提出了递归采样方法，通过渐进式帧采样、关键帧预测和帧插值来生成长视频，以保持长期时间一致性并防止错误累积。4. 构建了一个名为InteriorVideo的数据集，包含1154个房间，并提供精确的地面真实内部通道序列和相机轨迹。

Result: X2Video能够生成长视频，具有时间一致性和逼真性，并且能够根据内部通道进行引导。此外，它还能有效地处理参考图像、全局和局部文本提示等多种模态的控制，并支持通过参数调整对颜色、材质、几何和光照进行编辑。

Conclusion: X2Video在视频生成领域取得了显著进展，能够生成高质量、时间一致且可控的视频，为未来的视频生成研究和应用奠定了基础。

Abstract: We present X2Video, the first diffusion model for rendering photorealistic
videos guided by intrinsic channels including albedo, normal, roughness,
metallicity, and irradiance, while supporting intuitive multi-modal controls
with reference images and text prompts for both global and local regions. The
intrinsic guidance allows accurate manipulation of color, material, geometry,
and lighting, while reference images and text prompts provide intuitive
adjustments in the absence of intrinsic information. To enable these
functionalities, we extend the intrinsic-guided image generation model XRGB to
video generation by employing a novel and efficient Hybrid Self-Attention,
which ensures temporal consistency across video frames and also enhances
fidelity to reference images. We further develop a Masked Cross-Attention to
disentangle global and local text prompts, applying them effectively onto
respective local and global regions. For generating long videos, our novel
Recursive Sampling method incorporates progressive frame sampling, combining
keyframe prediction and frame interpolation to maintain long-range temporal
consistency while preventing error accumulation. To support the training of
X2Video, we assembled a video dataset named InteriorVideo, featuring 1,154
rooms from 295 interior scenes, complete with reliable ground-truth intrinsic
channel sequences and smooth camera trajectories. Both qualitative and
quantitative evaluations demonstrate that X2Video can produce long, temporally
consistent, and photorealistic videos guided by intrinsic conditions.
Additionally, X2Video effectively accommodates multi-modal controls with
reference images, global and local text prompts, and simultaneously supports
editing on color, material, geometry, and lighting through parametric tuning.
Project page: https://luckyhzt.github.io/x2video

</details>


<div id='cs.MA'></div>

# cs.MA [[Back]](#toc)

### [362] [Network Topology and Information Efficiency of Multi-Agent Systems: Study based on MARL](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07888)
*Xinren Zhang,Sixi Cheng,Zixin Zhong,Jiadong Yu*

Main category: cs.MA

TL;DR: MAS中的通信拓扑和信息效率对于有效协调至关重要。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 探索MAS通信的结构和评估方法，重点关注通信拓扑和信息效率。

Method: 研究了有向和顺序通信拓扑结构，并引入了信息熵效率指数（IEI）和专业化效率指数（SEI）来评估消息的紧凑性和角色的区分度。

Result: 有向和顺序拓扑结构在各种任务中都提高了性能并降低了通信开销。将IEI和SEI纳入训练目标可提高成功率和收敛速度。

Conclusion: 设计自适应通信拓扑和信息高效的消息传递对于复杂MAS中的有效协调至关重要。

Abstract: Multi-agent systems (MAS) solve complex problems through coordinated
autonomous entities with individual decision-making capabilities. While
Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning (MARL) enables these agents to learn
intelligent strategies, it faces challenges of non-stationarity and partial
observability. Communications among agents offer a solution, but questions
remain about its optimal structure and evaluation. This paper explores two
underexamined aspects: communication topology and information efficiency. We
demonstrate that directed and sequential topologies improve performance while
reducing communication overhead across both homogeneous and heterogeneous
tasks. Additionally, we introduce two metrics -- Information Entropy Efficiency
Index (IEI) and Specialization Efficiency Index (SEI) -- to evaluate message
compactness and role differentiation. Incorporating these metrics into training
objectives improves success rates and convergence speed. Our findings highlight
that designing adaptive communication topologies with information-efficient
messaging is essential for effective coordination in complex MAS.

</details>


<div id='cs.RO'></div>

# cs.RO [[Back]](#toc)

### [363] [FLEET: Formal Language-Grounded Scheduling for Heterogeneous Robot Teams](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07417)
*Corban Rivera,Grayson Byrd,Meghan Booker,Bethany Kemp,Allison Gaines,Emma Holmes,James Uplinger,Celso M de Melo,David Handelman*

Main category: cs.RO

TL;DR: FLEET是一个混合框架，利用LLM和MILP将自然语言指令转化为多机器人调度，提高了跨异构任务的成功率，并在真实硬件试验中得到了验证。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 协调异构机器人团队并从自然语言指令生成优化的多机器人计划是一个具有挑战性的问题，因为纯语言规划器在长期协调和幻觉方面存在困难，而纯形式化方法需要封闭世界模型。

Method: FLEET框架结合了LLM前端和形式化后端。LLM前端生成任务图和机器人-任务适应性矩阵；形式化后端解决最小化制造时间的问题，同时机器人执行其自由形式的子任务，并具有自主闭环控制。

Result: 在多个自由形式语言引导的自主协调基准测试中，FLEET在双机器人团队和异构任务上的成功率优于最先进的生成规划器。MILP主要改进了时间结构，而LLM衍生的适应性对于能力耦合任务至关重要，结合使用可提供最佳性能。

Conclusion: FLEET通过结合LLM的灵活性和MILP的优化能力，成功地将自然语言指令转化为优化的多机器人调度，并在仿真和实际硬件测试中均表现出优越的性能。

Abstract: Coordinating heterogeneous robot teams from free-form natural-language
instructions is hard. Language-only planners struggle with long-horizon
coordination and hallucination, while purely formal methods require
closed-world models. We present FLEET, a hybrid decentralized framework that
turns language into optimized multi-robot schedules. An LLM front-end produces
(i) a task graph with durations and precedence and (ii) a capability-aware
robot--task fitness matrix; a formal back-end solves a makespan-minimization
problem while the underlying robots execute their free-form subtasks with
agentic closed-loop control. Across multiple free-form language-guided autonomy
coordination benchmarks, FLEET improves success over state of the art
generative planners on two-agent teams across heterogeneous tasks. Ablations
show that mixed integer linear programming (MILP) primarily improves temporal
structure, while LLM-derived fitness is decisive for capability-coupled tasks;
together they deliver the highest overall performance. We demonstrate the
translation to real world challenges with hardware trials using a pair of
quadruped robots with disjoint capabilities.

</details>


### [364] [VeMo: A Lightweight Data-Driven Approach to Model Vehicle Dynamics](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07447)
*Girolamo Oddo,Roberto Nuca,Matteo Parsani*

Main category: cs.RO

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种基于GRU的轻量级编码器-解码器模型，用于在信息有限的情况下预测高动态车辆的未来状态，并证明了其准确性和鲁棒性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在自动驾驶应用中，由于车辆信息不完整，开发高性能车辆的动态模型是一个复杂的问题。现有的车辆模型是在信息稀缺的条件下开发的。

Method: 提出了一种基于门控循环单元（GRU）层的轻量级编码器-解码器模型，用于关联车辆的未来状态与其过去的状态以及控制动作。

Result: 该模型在极端动态条件下实现了低于2.6%的最大平均相对误差，并且在输入数据存在噪声时表现出良好的鲁棒性。此外，该模型还能在输出信号（如纵向和横向加速度、偏航率和车辆纵向速度）方面保持物理一致性。

Conclusion: 该数据驱动模型在信息稀缺的情况下能够准确预测车辆的动态行为，并具有良好的鲁棒性和物理一致性。

Abstract: Developing a dynamic model for a high-performance vehicle is a complex
problem that requires extensive structural information about the system under
analysis. This information is often unavailable to those who did not design the
vehicle and represents a typical issue in autonomous driving applications,
which are frequently developed on top of existing vehicles; therefore, vehicle
models are developed under conditions of information scarcity. This paper
proposes a lightweight encoder-decoder model based on Gate Recurrent Unit
layers to correlate the vehicle's future state with its past states, measured
onboard, and control actions the driver performs. The results demonstrate that
the model achieves a maximum mean relative error below 2.6% in extreme dynamic
conditions. It also shows good robustness when subject to noisy input data
across the interested frequency components. Furthermore, being entirely
data-driven and free from physical constraints, the model exhibits physical
consistency in the output signals, such as longitudinal and lateral
accelerations, yaw rate, and the vehicle's longitudinal velocity.

</details>


### [365] [HJCD-IK: GPU-Accelerated Inverse Kinematics through Batched Hybrid Jacobian Coordinate Descent](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07514)
*Cael Yasutake,Zachary Kingston,Brian Plancher*

Main category: cs.RO

TL;DR: Error


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Error

Method: Error

Result: Error

Conclusion: Error

Abstract: Inverse Kinematics (IK) is a core problem in robotics, in which joint
configurations are found to achieve a desired end-effector pose. Although
